Description: Worn blue glazed composition shabti of Ğd-ḥr sš nsw(?) with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard(broken away) and parallel hands in relief holding two hoes and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar; the foot has broken away.
Condition: incomplete - foot missing, cracked and glaze worn
